message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's a unique opportunity to own something truly valuable. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I'm extending this offer to you at $95. Let me know if you're interested!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. After considering your offer, I believe we can find common ground. I am willing to offer the product at $90, which is a bit higher than your proposal. This price reflects the value and quality of the product. I hope you'll find this offer acceptable.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $82.50. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. I've reviewed your latest offer and I believe we can reach an agreement. I am willing to sell the product at $87.5, which I think is a fair compromise between our previous offers. I hope this meets your expectations.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $82. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

I understand your position, Bob, and I appreciate your persistence. After careful consideration, I am willing to sell the product at $85, which is a slight increase from your last offer. This price reflects the value of the product while allowing us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement. I hope this proposal is acceptable to you.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. This is my final offer. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
